page.title: 05TRADE
page.content: {THE BUTCHERS SHOP The butchers shop is next to the village green.It is run by father, mother and sons.This special butchers has its own slaughter house behind it. So everything is fresh.They also sell mustard, a sort of hot sauce and it has a bright notice outside.In the abbatoir,cows,pigs and sheep are slaughtered for meat.People come from miles around to buy meat for their freezers. {THE PUBLIC HOUSE} The pub is very old. It has oak beams inside.The villagers gather there to play games like darts,skittles and pool.They sell many kinds of alcoholic drinks.The backroom is used for parties.This week the small room was full of villagers celebrating the birthday of a villager.The landlords wife made a cake with candles on it.
